html:
crown of pride. The city of Samaria, the pride of the kingdom of Israel (28:1).

drunkards of Ephraim. Sin and apostasy (28:1).

shall be trodden under feet. Assyria will capture the inhabitants of the Northern Kingdom. Under feet speaks of subjugation and enslavement (1 Cor. 15:24-25; D&C 49:6; 76:61, 106).
